description.value:
A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent. Make a melee Strike against a foe. The foe must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.classDCs.barbarian.dc.value)] save against your class DC.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is dazed and can barely vocalize. It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1} and its speech is raspy and hard to understand. It must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] to use linguistic actions or supply verbal spellcasting components until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 3} instead of stunned 1.
